message.content:
cs.SY, cs.RO, cs.MA, cs.DS, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the control and stabilization of autonomous agents in a formation, which falls under the category of systems and control (cs.SY). The use of graph rigidity and kinematic point models suggests a focus on robotics (cs.RO) and mathematical aspects (cs.MA) of the problem. The analysis of discrepancies in desired or sensed distances between neighboring agents involves the use of algorithms and data structures (cs.DS) to maintain the formation. Finally, the exponential convergence to a closed circular orbit suggests the use of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) techniques for trajectory planning and optimization.
